attributes.action: investigate if the increased solar activity on 23rd March affected the sailors GPS readings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The GPS equipement similar to one's the Arrested sailors were using is known to get affected by unusual solar activity.

On 23rd MArch Sydney observatory recorded unusual solar activity at 21:30 UT which is about 14:30 hours on Iraqi Iranian waters. PLease verify at http://www.sydneyobservatory.com.au/blog/?m=20070323

Perhaps a simple natural event could be the final cause of this unfortunate stand off. The UK government should verify the same and present this data to  Iran and the UN. All sides should forget and forgive each other for the consequences of this natural event.

Only Tony can do this? Petition for peace becuase this situation can get very bad for the whole world.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
